abstract: A post-debate process that once was an organic effort, the "spin room" is now an expected and well-orchestrated part of a debate. After seeing the previous action, it is not hard to guess what will be said if patterns hold.
snippet: A post-debate process that once was an organic effort, the "spin room" is now an expected and well-orchestrated part of a debate. After seeing the previous action, it is not hard to guess what will be said if patterns hold.
lead_paragraph: If a presidential campaign is a test of a candidate's ability to govern, the moments immediately after a presidential debate measure a campaign's ability to twist, manipulate, cajole and spin members of the press.

headline.main: Spin Recycle: What the Post-Debate Debate Might Be
